effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 735,096 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 303,365.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 6,924 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 2,065 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 563,477 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
